extensionName.message: TST Open Bookmarks as Partial Tree

extensionDescription.message: Provides ability to open only some bookmarks in a folder as a partial tree on Tree Style Tab.

context_openPartialTreeFromHere_label.message: Open &as a Partial Tree from here

context_openPartialTreeFromHere_descript.message: (*available on any bookmark item saved with their tree structure, and allows you to open only the specified item and its descendants in a folder)

context_openAllRecursively_label.message: Open &All as a Tree including subfolders

config_context_openPartialTreeFromHere_l.message: Open as a Partial Tree from here

config_context_openAllRecursively_label.message: Open All as a Tree including subfolders

config_openDiscarded_label.message: Keep tabs pended until they become active

config_containerRedirectKey_label_after.message: (*Please set a value same to the one in the addon's options page):
